location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Muscat to Sir Seymour Fitzgerald, Governor of Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Syed Torkee [Turki bin Said] and his intentions towards Muscat.The letter also discusses the Political Agent at Muscat, Lieutenant George Andrew Atkinson, who Pelly describes as being 'inclined to excitement' and who has on several occassions, which are described in the letter, nearly compromised the British Government.The letter concludes with Pellys thoughts and opinions on Salim II bin Thuwaini, the current Sultan of Muscat.
